Picture cannot be downloaded as you denied storage permission
To be able to download pictures you must give storage permission on the next dialog as all downloaded pictures go to storage. APOD will never touch any other files in storage.
Picture cannot be downloaded as you denied storage permission. You need to go to settings and allow storage permission if you want to download pictures
